entry.title: BadAss Keyboard Shortcuts
entry.content:
shift, cmd, T -- open the last tab closed in chrome and FF

And of course shortcut foo is awesome too!

rake routes | grep mixtape Will only show the routes that match this resource.

Indents in text editors

cmd [ to move it <- and cmd ] to move it -> in both textmate and sublime

In Chrome: ⌥⌘I (Command - Option - I) keys to open Developer Tools ⌥⌘J (Command - Option - J) to open Developer Tools and bring focus to the Console. ⇧⌘C (Command - Shift - C) to toggle Inspect Element mode.
